name: Fisherman - Idle Fishing Clicker
description:
Addicting Idle Incremental Tycoon Clicker, grow own company, which will generate cash from fishing and catching fishes, travel to new sea, unlock rare items, hire new workers, upgrade them. Start the money adventure and generate great income, It's a Fishing Clash with business. Explore Fishing World. It is a game for boys, for girls, for kids and adults. This app is Free to download, Let's Fish.

This free game is not a boring Company simulator, become hero which will bring small company into big business, which will generate a lot of money, buy special power-ups, and become rich. Take Fishing Quest. Start the hooked fisher tycoon simulator. And become Fish Master in capitalist world. Can you handle the pressure and become the greatest Business Manager?

Features:
✔ Buy new fishes and look at your business evolution, from one fisherman to own company with workers + aquarium full of fishes
✔ Prestige and travel to new sea.
✔ Take various decisions (decide about company future)
✔ Catch new fishes and gather legendary items.
✔ Buy special and normal upgrades
✔ Train/Upgrade and get new workers
✔ Use your boat/ship to transport various things.
✔ Discover easter eggs
✔ And a lot more.

Relax and play this game, and make fortune, become billionaire. Gameplay is casual and simple, tapping will grant You cash income, which you can invest into endless upgrades. Each second grant a new cash income. This is offline, not online game. Best time waster. Download me😛
